old:
アッカーシェラン大陸のほぼ中央に位置する地域
荒涼とした風景が広がるこの地域には竜の神殿があり、
その神殿に寄り添うように王都メガドが建造された
要塞を思わせる王都はアッカー家三代目当主キリークの
治世に計画され、完成は十四代目当主ドラフの
即位目前であった
new:
Located almost in the centre of Acre Selund, this area is characterized by a barren landscape. 
In this region, there is a dragon temple, and adjacent to the temple, the royal capital of Megado was built, resembling a fortress. 
The construction of this royal capital was planned during the reign of Kilik, the third head of the Acre family, and it was completed just before the coronation of Doraf, the fourteenth head.

old:
メガドシスの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜が現れたことにより、各地を巡る竜力にも
異変が起きた。その結果、土地の持っている“記憶”
というべきものにすら歪みが生じているようだ
new:
The world of history engraved into the land of Megado.
Various anomalies have occurred in the Dragon Force that travel across the land, due to the appearance of the evil dragon. 
As a result, even the "memories" that the land holds seem to have become distorted.

old:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
new:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the surroundings of Megado. 
The ground floors have already been occupied by the demon army, but it seems like they were unaware of the existence of the underground floors. 
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of Megado are hiding in the underground floors, holding their breath as they believe in the possibility of rescue.

old:
王家に仕えるハイセプター、キルスティが住む小屋
魔物によって民が苦しむアッカーシェランを憂い
秘術であるハイセプターの戦闘術を世に広めんと
慣れぬあばら家で暮らしているらしい
new:
The cottage where Kirsty, serving the royal family, lives.
She worries about Acre Selund, where the people suffer due to monsters.
Thus, she endeavors to spread the combat techniques of the High Scepter, a secret art. 
It seems that she lives in an unfamiliar, rundown house.

old:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
new:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado, where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the lower level and where over half of the continent's population lived. 
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon Army, and many residents lost their lives.

old:
白い木で作られた簡易な柵は、アンセスターオークが
縄張りを誇示する際に多用されるもの
賢明な旅人であれば忌避すべき“危険”の標である
new: The simple fence made of white wood is often used by Ancestor Orcs to showcase their territory, and it serves as a "danger" sign that wise travelers should avoid.

old:
火垂れ山から飛来した巨大な噴石とその周辺
岩は鳥が羽根を休め、獣が身を隠すのに
ちょうどよかったらしく様々な獣たちが住処として
いるようだ
new:
A huge volcanic rock from the Firefall Mountain and its surrounding rocks were perfect for birds to rest their feathers and for animals to hide. 
It seems that various animals have made this place their habitat.

old:
水辺に面した小さな洞穴
霧の森から漏れ出でたものが留まりやすい
風の音が何事かを囁いているように聞こえる
ことから、以前より不気味な噂が立っている
new:
A small cave facing the water's edge where things leaking out of the Forest of Mist tend to stay.
The sound of the wind seems to whisper something, which has led to eerie rumors for some time now.

old:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに
土は焼けたままであり草木も回復していない
new:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist. 
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the soil remains burned and the grass and trees have not recovered.

old:
城塞都市メガドの城門外に設えられた詰所
元は商人らが優先的にメガドへ入るための手続きを
受けていた場であるが、現在は出撃の令を待つ
ドワーフオークや、軍属の獣たちがひしめいている
new:
Outside the gates of the fortress city Megado, there is a guard post set up. 
Originally, it was a place where merchants would go through the necessary procedures to enter Megado. 
However, it is now crowded with dwarf orcs and military animals waiting for the order to march out.

old:
メガド居住層の奥に造られた野ざらしの牢屋
魔軍の襲撃から逃げられず、また不幸にも生け捕りに
された人々がドワーフオークから無残な拷問を受けた
であろうことは、その場に生々しく残る痕跡から容易
に察することができる
new: Hidden prison exposed beyond the depths of the Megado residential layer; it is easy to deduce from the vivid traces left behind that the unfortunate individuals who were unable to escape the onslaught of the Demon Army have fallen into the hands of the Orcs and likely suffered gruesome torture.

old:
王家の命により封鎖されている地下道
王族関連施設に繋がるであろうという
推測以外、情報が無い場所でもある
何らかの意図を持って隠されている場で
あることは確かだ
new:
The underground passage is sealed off by the royal family's orders. 
It is a place where there is no information other than speculation that it may be connected to facilities related to the royal family. 
It is certain that it is hidden with some intention.

old:
城塞都市メガドの防衛の要となるニルビリス大橋と
その上に建つ関所。魔軍側も本関所の重要性は
理解しているらしく、防衛のために随時戦力を
割いている。関所の開閉については、魔軍の
集結具合と連動しているらしい
new:
The Nilviris Bridge, which serves as a crucial defense point for the fortress city of Megado, accompanied by a checkpoint built on top of it. 
It appears that the Demon Army also understands the importance of this checkpoint, as they are constantly dedicating forces to its defense. 
The opening and closing of the checkpoint seem to be synchronized with the gathering of the Demon Army.

old:
メガド城壁内、最奥に位置する広場
ドワーフオークが捕えた魔物に対して戦甲を
装着するために使われている。魔物は戦甲に
よって自らの意思を制御され、ドワーフオークに
使役される存在となる
new:
Inside Megado Castle, at the very back, there is a plaza where beasts captured by Dwarf Orcs are dressed in battle armor.
The enemies are controlled by the battle armor, making them subservient to the Dwarf Orcs.

old:
フェルヤナ荒原の山壁側からメガドシス高地
中心部を繋ぐ通路。かつては頻繁に使われていたが
渓谷を渡る船や家畜を使っての山越えが主流となって
からは、たまに狩人らが利用するのみとなっていた
メガド周辺が魔軍に包囲された際、徒歩での脱出を
試みる者にはこの古道しか残されていなかった
new:
From the mountain wall side of the Feryana Wilderness to the center of the Megadosys Plateau, there is a pathway. 
It used to be frequently used, but now crossing the mountains using livestock or ships to cross the valley has become the mainstream. 
Only occasionally do hunters use it now. 
When the area around Megado was surrounded by the Demon Army, those who attempted to escape on foot had no choice but to use this ancient path.

old:
大地の陥没からなる自然豊かな洞窟
目立たない場所に位置することと、陽の光が差し込む
構造から内部には緑が生い茂り、野生動物たちが棲む
今となっては、悪しき竜と魔軍の所業によって荒廃する
前の“アッカーシェランの自然”が残る貴重な場所
new:
A natural and abundant cave formed by the collapse of the surface. 
Located in an inconspicuous place, it is filled with greenery and inhabited by wild animals, thanks to the structure that allows sunlight to penetrate it. 
It is now in a state of ruin due to the deeds of the evil dragon and the demon army. 
This is a precious place where the remnants of the previous "Self" of Acre Selund remain.

old: ニルビリス大橋からメガド居住層へと繋がる地下水路
new: From Nilviris Bridge, an underground waterway leads to the Megado residential layer.

old:
城塞都市メガド市民の生活を支える上水道
都市には無くてはならない設備だが、汚水を飲む
ことに慣れたドワーフオークたちは重要性を見出さず
魔軍の中継基地として使っている
new:
Fortress City Megado's water supply supports the lives of its citizens. 
Although it is an essential facility for the city, the Dwarf Orcs, who have become accustomed to drinking sewage, fail to recognize its importance and instead use it as a relay base for the Demon Army.

old:
メガド王宮層の周辺には王宮層を取り囲むように
複数の建造物が円形に立ち並び、それぞれ左右に
伸びた通路で繋がっている。元は回廊であったため
現在もそれらの建造物の総称として≪メガド回廊≫
という呼称が用いられている
new:
Around the Megado Palace on the Megado Royal Layer, multiple buildings are arranged in a circle, connected by corridors extending left and right. 
Originally a corridor, they are still collectively referred to as the "Megado Corridor."

old:
城塞都市メガドの最上部に位置する王宮
王族とそれに連なる限られた者のみが居住する
ことを許された場所であり、厳重に守られている
一般市民がこの場を直に目にすることは
人生の中で恐らく一度も無いだろう
new:
At the top of Fortress City Megado stands the royal palace, a place allowed only to the royal family and a select few.
It is heavily guarded and unlikely for ordinary citizens to ever lay eyes upon in their lifetime.

old:
メガド王宮層を囲むように建てられた建造物の内
聖堂として使われていた場所
王族の挙式や戴冠式の際は、大陸中から集まった
有力な貴族が一堂に会する
new:
Within the buildings built around the Megado Royal Palace Layer, a place that was used as a cathedral.
During royal weddings and coronations, prominent nobles from all over the continent would gather together.

old:
戦士の修行を目的とし、様々な種類の魔物が
わざと放たれている祠。以前は王族を護る者たちが
平時にあってもその腕を鈍らせないようにと鍛練に
励んでいた場所であるが、近年はひたすらに武を
誇る風潮が薄れたため使用されることも減り、内部の
魔物のみが取り残されている
new:
The shrine, which is intentionally filled with various types of enemies, serves as a training ground for soldiers. 
In the past, it was a place where those who protected the royal family trained to keep their skills sharp even during times of peace. 
However, in recent years, the enthusiasm for showcasing one's martial prowess has diminished, resulting in a decrease in its usage. 
As a result, only the monsters inside the shrine remain.
